ch.fhnw.imvs.smartcard

Class ResponseAPDU

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.fhnw.imvs.smartcard.ResponseAPDU

  • public class ResponseAPDU
extends java.lang.Object
    The Response APDU consists of two Parts: An optional Body of variable length and a Trailer with two status bytes.
    Author:
    Christof Arnosti (christof.arnosti@fhnw.ch)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResponseAPDU

        public ResponseAPDU(byte[] data)
        Creates a ResponseAPDU object out of the raw bytes of an APDU.
        Parameters:
        data - The Bytearray containing the Response APDU

      • ResponseAPDU

        public ResponseAPDU(byte[] body,
            int statuscode)
        Create a ResponseAPDU out of a body and a statuscode
        Parameters:
        body - bytearray of arbitary length or null. Null is treated as no body
        statuscode - The last two bytes of the integer will be used as status code.

    • Method Detail

        Checks if this is a valid response APDU.
        Returns:
        true if this is a valid response APDU, false otherwise.
